what_is_setsail.a: SetSail BizAccel is a business acceleration and incubation platform under President University that supports students in developing startups and business ideas.

who_can_join.a: SetSail BizAccel is primarily open to President University students who are interested in entrepreneurship and startup development.

program_cost.q: Do I need to pay to join the program?
program_cost.a: Most SetSail BizAccel programs are supported by the university and can be joined without any participation fee, subject to selection.

startup_type.q: Is SetSail BizAccel only for tech startups?
startup_type.a: No. SetSail BizAccel supports various types of businesses including technology, creative industries, social enterprises, culinary, and tourism startups.

how_to_join.q: How do I join SetSail BizAccel?
how_to_join.a: You can join by registering through the official SetSail BizAccel platform and applying to available programs during the registration period.
